Upgrades.Name: Block
Upgrades.Description: Provides some protection against all damage. Each upgrade blocks +10%

Upgrades.Name: Resist Physical
Upgrades.Description: Significantly reduces physical damage by 50%.

Upgrades.Name: Resist Range
Upgrades.Description: Significantly reduces ranged damage by physical 50%.

Upgrades.Name: Resist Fire
Upgrades.Description: Significantly reduces fire damage by 50%, makes you weak to water.

Upgrades.Name: Resist Water
Upgrades.Description: Significantly reduces water damage by 50%, makes you weak to leaf.

Upgrades.Name: Resist Leaf
Upgrades.Description: Significantly reduces leaf damage by 50%, makes you weak to fire.

Upgrades.Name: Sword
Upgrades.Description: A simple melee attack targeting a single enemy. +30% damage per upgrade

Upgrades.Name: Slash
Upgrades.Description: A strong melee attack targeting a single enemy. +25% damage per upgrade

Upgrades.Name: Cross Slash
Upgrades.Description: A strong melee attack targeting multiple enemies. +25% damage per upgrade

Upgrades.Name: Whirlwind
Upgrades.Description: A flurry of melee attacks targeting multiple enemies. Increases speed

Upgrades.Name: Brave Slash
Upgrades.Description: A focused and powerful melee attack targeting a single enemy. Increases defense

Upgrades.Name: Fireball
Upgrades.Description: Enables fire magic attacks. +50% fire damage per upgrade

Upgrades.Name: Water
Upgrades.Description: Enables water magic attacks. +50% water damage per upgrade

Upgrades.Name: Leaf
Upgrades.Description: Enables leaf magic attacks. +50% leaf damage per upgrade

Upgrades.Name: Area of Effect
Upgrades.Description: Makes magic attacks more effective against groups of enemies.

Upgrades.Name: Cannon
Upgrades.Description: Makes magic attacks more effective against single enemies. +35% damage

Upgrades.Name: Enchant
Upgrades.Description: Lets sword attacks break elemental shields based on previous element, deals 0 dmg.

Upgrades.Name: Lightning
Upgrades.Description: Deals lightning damage, cutting through darkness.

Upgrades.Name: Shadow
Upgrades.Description: Deals shadow damage, consuming all light.

Upgrades.Name: Bow
Upgrades.Description: A quick ranged attack targeting a single enemy. +25% damage per upgrade

Upgrades.Name: Dodge
Upgrades.Description: Side step to avoid enemy attacks.

Upgrades.Name: Multi Shot
Upgrades.Description: Shoots a spread of arrows targeting multiple enemies.

Upgrades.Name: Sniper Shot
Upgrades.Description: A precise ranged attack targeting a critical point on single enemy.

Upgrades.Name: Honey
Upgrades.Description: Immobilizes enemies with sticky honey.
